Method Detail

addStringToMessageText

protected void addStringToMessageText(java.lang.StringBuilder messageBuffer,
                                      java.lang.String stringToAdd,
                                      int lengthToAdd)
This method adds a specified string to the message buffer that holds the message text that will be written to the bridge. Only a specified number of characters is added. and any text value that is to be added to the message buffer that is less than the desired length to be added is padded with blank characters, as needed.

Parameters:
messageBuffer - The MessageBuffer to be appended with the desired String value for a specified length.
stringToAdd - The String value to be added to the message buffer.
lengthToAdd - The int value of the length to be added.

addNumberToMessageText

protected void addNumberToMessageText(java.lang.StringBuilder messageBuffer,
                                      int numberToAdd,
                                      int lengthToAdd)
This method adds a numeric int value to the message buffer that holds the message text that will be written to the bridge. Only a specified number of characters is added. A value that is less than the desired length to be added is padded with blank characters on the left, as needed. A value that exceeds the specified number of characters is replace with a zero.

Parameters:
messageBuffer - The MessageBuffer to be appended with the desired String value for a specified length.
stringToAdd - The String value to be added to the message buffer.
lengthToAdd - The int value of the length to be added.

addBigDecimalToMessageText

protected void addBigDecimalToMessageText(java.lang.StringBuilder messageBuffer,
                                          java.math.BigDecimal numberToAdd,
                                          int lengthToAdd)
This method adds a specified decimal number to the message buffer that holds the message text that will be written to the bridge. Only a specified number of characters is added. and any text value that is to be added to the message buffer that is less than the desired length to be added is padded with blank characters, as needed. To be used for dollar amounts especially.

Parameters:
messageBuffer - The MessageBuffer to be appended with the desired String value for a specified length.
stringToAdd - The String value to be added to the message buffer.
lengthToAdd - The int value of the length to be added.
